page.title: 04A Westhill Working Day
page.content:
The Westhill Residents interviewed included a Doctor,Shopkeepers,Janitor and Playgroup Supervisor.
Typical Day: arise between 6.45am and 7.30am;leave house half an hour before work starts; Work starts between 9.00 and 10.00am; Work finishes around 5.30pm.
These residents live within walking distance of work but travel by car. Most of these people are working all day and prefer not to go home for lunch.
Dinner is around 6.00pm,though this time may vary.Most residents spend their evenings with their family watching television or gardening.They retire to bed between 11.00pm and 12.00pm.
